column5: Stay in our 1900's Farm House situated in the middle of a working Organic Farm.  Hike, bike, swim and explore on our 225 acre Organic Farm  Dining, breweries, wineries, live music, shopping and and outdoor movie theatre - all within 20 minutes of Montesino Ranch  ***PLEASE NOTE*** Extra guest charge is for 18 and older
column8: Montesino Farm House, 225 acres, RIVER access
